explanation.overview: 这几个词都与表达观点或评价有关，但用法和含义有所区别。

details.meaning: 简短的评论或说法，通常是中性的或随意的观察。
details.example: She made a remark about the weather.（她对天气发表了看法。）

details.meaning: 对某事的评价或说明，可以是口头或书面的，既可正面也可负面。
details.example: He commented on the new policy.（他对新政策发表了评论。）

details.meaning: 较详细的评价或分析，通常针对书籍、电影、产品等。
details.example: I read a review of the new movie.（我看了一篇新电影的评论。）

details.meaning: 批评，指出缺点或不足，语气通常较为负面。
details.example: The movie received a lot of criticism.（这部电影收到了很多批评。）

life_examples.remark: She made a remark about the homework.（她对作业发表了看法。）
life_examples.comment: He commented that the homework was difficult.（他说作业很难。）
life_examples.review: The teacher gave a review of the students’ performance.（老师对学生表现进行了评价。）
life_examples.criticism: Some students received criticism for being late.（一些学生因迟到受到了批评。）

life_examples.remark: My friend made a quick remark about the movie.（我朋友对电影做了简短评论。）
life_examples.comment: I commented that the movie was interesting.（我评论电影很有趣。）
life_examples.review: She wrote a detailed review of the movie.（她写了电影的详细影评。）
life_examples.criticism: The film faced criticism for its weak plot.（这部电影因剧情薄弱受到了批评。）

common_errors.error: ❌ He gave a criticism about the book.
common_errors.correction: ✅ He gave a comment about the book.（评论书籍用comment更合适。）

common_errors.error: ❌ I wrote a comment on the new film.
common_errors.correction: ✅ I wrote a review on the new film.（写较长的电影评价用review。）

mini_test.question: 选择正确答案：She wrote a detailed ___ of the restaurant.
选择正确答案：He made a quick ___ about the weather.
选择正确答案：The movie received a lot of ___.
